suncertify.db
Class DataAdapter

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.db.DataAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataFacade
Direct Known Subclasses:
RemoteDataFacadeImpl
public class DataAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataFacade

Implementation of DataFacade, which exposes business method to the Gui and can be used also when running in standalone mode. Adapts the Data implementation to an interface that is more manageable for the GUI

Method Detail

remoteBookOperation

public boolean remoteBookOperation(java.lang.String customerNo,
                                   Record oldRecord)
                            throws RecordNotFoundException,
                                   java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                   AlreadyBookedException
Performs a full booking operation (book / unbooking). Sequence is lock record, read it, compare it with the old record (how it was before booking) and book it

Specified by:
remoteBookOperation in interface DataFacade
Parameters:
customerNo - the customer who is booking, empty if it is an unbook operation
oldRecord - the record,how it was read from the database
Returns:
true if operation was successful,false otherwise
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException
java.rmi.RemoteException
AlreadyBookedException

retrieveRecord

public Record retrieveRecord(int recNo)
                      throws RecordNotFoundException
Retrieves a record

Specified by:
retrieveRecord in interface DataFacade
Parameters:
recNo - position of the record in the file
Returns:
an instance of Record filled with data from the file
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException

getRecordList

public java.util.List getRecordList(java.lang.String hotelName,
                                    java.lang.String cityName,
                                    boolean refresh)
                             throws RecordNotFoundException
Retrieves a list of records which match the given search criteria

Specified by:
getRecordList in interface DataFacade
Parameters:
hotelName - the hotel name search criteria
cityName - the city search criteria
refresh - whether we have to reload data from the cache
Returns:
a list containing all the records which match the search criteria
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException
